channel.title: All jobs on Packit Service Status

item.title: [Resolved] Slow/delayed processing of Packit jobs
item.description: Packit Service was overflown with tasks (most likely caused by Copr having trouble starting builds), hit resource limits and as a result stopped processing tasks for about 9 hours. We’ve increased resources and got things running, but it will take a while before the accumulated queue of tasks is processed and things get back to normal. Update: the queue has been processed, everything should be back to normal.
item.content:
Packit Service was overflown with tasks (most likely caused by Copr having trouble starting builds), hit resource limits and as a result stopped processing tasks for about 9 hours. We’ve increased resources and got things running, but it will take a while before the accumulated queue of tasks is processed and things get back to normal.

Update: the queue has been processed, everything should be back to normal.
